title: How to Pause or Delete Your Fika Account

steps.step_detail: To pause or delete your account, you need to first log into the Fika app.
Go to setting screen -> Account Settings

You will have 2 options: Pause or Delete your account

  • By pausing your account, you’ll not be seen on Discovery, and people will not be able to chat with you. Your connections will be temporarily unconnected until you return.
  • By deleting your account, you’ll lose all your history, matches, and chats. This action is permanent, and something Fika doesn’t recommend unless you’re 100% sure.
Please help us improve Fika by letting us know why you’re pausing or deleting your account.
If you wish to use Fika again, you can sign up to a new account or reactivate your paused account. All newly-activated accounts must be verified again for the safety of our community.

seo.title: How to delete your account on Fika
seo.description: You can pause or delete your account anytime at Fika and you can always come back anytime
